name: ULTIMATE SUPER MOTO RUSH
description:
We know your love for bikes is ultimate that’s why we are here with the new 3D release of Moto GP latest bike game Ultimate Super Moto GP rush. Come on biker your chance to rush in the race of moto gp bikes is bright enough, what you have to do is just install the game on your IOS device, grab your heart favorite bike and rush the tracks of ultimate super moto gp 3D game.
Pilot your bike at the speed to rock the world of racing moto gp take it to the top at which you cannot rush your moto gp in real life. Put your helmet on because safety come first. Steer your bike with loud and noisy sound of bike gears and mark the track while smoke is roaming in the air, the sensational of latest 3D ultimate super moto gp rush game will feel you like you are actually driving the monster. Just forget about the world and indulge yourself in the awesomeness of 3D ULTIMATE SUPER MOTO GP RUSH game.
Listen Biker!! 3D Ultimate Super Moto GP game is a bike racing game with physics based controls, gear up your moto bike to rush for the top speed super-fast bike while steering moto bike collect coins but be careful of the traffic rushing at the track, they are not so happy with your skills of driving moto bike and your super-fast speedy moto bike Best in town. Prove your bike rushing skills by controlling moto bike with super sky high speed during rush time of traffic in a city or a highway.

Caution: Put your helmet first because Safety come first.

Features:
Choose Super-Fast moto gp bikes with realistic physics based controls
Enjoy sensational 3D Tracks to rush your moto bike
Feel your phone as you’re holding handle of your super-fast moto GP bike
Accelerates the speed by tapping on screen with passion
NOS to burn the speed of super moto bike
Rewards to boost the speed and efficiency e.g. Magnets, coins Etc
3D effect of Smoke to feel real moto gp tracks
Gear up the race of moto bike with special sound effects
Ultimate super moto gp rush is compatible with all IOS devices
More moto Bikes, Beautiful tracks of different countries And Super fun would be added in next update.
